author: Alex Davies
title: To Cut Carbon, Ditch Air Travel—and Get on the Right Track
description: Some environmentally conscious people are trying to give up flying. For some trips, there's a great, cleaner alternative: It's called a train.
content: It started with the California forest fires. Ariella Granett lives in Berkeley, and stapling a paper smoke mask to fit her 8-year-old daughter's face made the planet's ills feel personal. Then, last spring, her son came home from school and announced the worl… [+5470 chars]
